test_cases.title: API Test - Create Test Case with Valid Data
test_cases.description: Verify that a valid request with all necessary fields creates a new test case successfully.
steps: Send a POST request to /api/v1/tests with valid test case data including title, description, test_type, priority, steps, expected_result, preconditions, and test_data.
test_cases.expected_result: The API should respond with a status code of 201 Created and return the created test case object with all provided fields.

test_data.title: Sample Test Case
test_data.description: This is a sample test case.
test_data.expected_result: Expected outcome of the test case.

test_cases.title: API Test - Create Test Case with Missing Fields
test_cases.description: Verify that sending a request without required fields returns a 400 Bad Request.
steps: Send a POST request to /api/v1/tests with valid authentication headers.
Omit one of the required fields from the request body.
test_cases.expected_result: The API should respond with a status code of 400 Bad Request and an error message indicating which field is missing.

test_cases.title: API Test - Unauthorized Access
test_cases.description: Verify that an unauthorized user cannot create a test case.
steps: Send a POST request to /api/v1/tests with invalid authentication headers.
test_cases.expected_result: The API should respond with a status code of 401 Unauthorized.

metadata.requirement:
API Endpoint: POST /api/v1/tests

Description:
Create a new test case. Requires authentication. Accepts test details in JSON format.

Generate API test cases including:
- Valid requests with expected responses
- Invalid requests (bad data, missing fields)
- Authentication/authorization scenarios
- Edge cases (empty data, large payloads)
